description: The Village of Mamaroneck Parks and Recreation Department welcomes runners and spectators for the 59th annual Turkey Trot and Gobbler Race! The event will be held on Sunday, November 23rd at Harbor Island Park. Race day registration opens at 8:00am. The 1-mile Gobbler Race will begin at 9:45am and the 5K Turkey Trot will begin after completion of Gobbler Race. All registrants will receive a free t-shirt and medal.
location: Harbor Island Park, Village of Mamaroneck, NY

event: Thanksgiving Day - All Non-Emergency Village Offices Are Closed
description: All Non-Emergency Village offices are closed on Thursday, November 27 in honor of Thanksgiving Day. There will be no garbage, organic, food scrap, rubbish, or recycling collection on Thursday, November 27. The Recycling Center, including the Compost Drop-Off Program, at 313 Fayette Avenue is closed. The Marine Education Center at Harbor Island Park is also closed.
location: Village of Mamaroneck

description: All Non-Emergency Village offices are closed on Friday, November 28. However, normal Friday garbage/rubbish pickup will take place as scheduled. The Recycling Center, including the Compost Drop-Off Program, at 313 Fayette Avenue is closed. The Marine Education Center at Harbor Island Park is also closed.
location: Village of Mamaroneck

description: The Tree Committee will hold its regular meeting at Village Hall at the Regatta. The meeting will focus on discussing tree-related matters within the Village. Agenda items may include reviewing past events, planting guidelines, street tree inventory reports, and potential new tree planting initiatives. Information on tree laws, recommended urban trees, and resources for finding arborists will likely be available or discussed.
location: Village Hall at the Regatta, 123 Mamaroneck Ave, Mamaroneck, NY, 10543
